channel.title: What features would YOU like to see in a text-based game?
channel.description:
I've seen many text-based RPGs being made but I don't see anyone asking what the users would like to see in the game (Or I may have missed it, please correct me if I have.).
So I thought it's time to ask what features would you like to see in a text-based game? For example; What skills would you like to see? What type of story line? Ect.
I am also thinking of writing one myself as I have a couple of bases on my computer anyway. Thanks in advance for your contributions, (if you do contribute :| )
